Our offices are open 7 days a week and we are happy to host tours of our recently upgraded homes any day of the week (when it is convenient for our guests). Our location couldn't be more convenient. Shopping, dining, banking and Old Town Alexandria are within arm's length. Our close proximity to I-95 and I-495 allows quick access to DC, National Harbor, Fort Belvoir, Andrews AFB... Kings Gardens is also conveniently located near the Old Town/Huntington Metro, which provides ultimate accessibility to the city. Convenience. Charm.

The emphasis is on comfortable living at Cherry Arms. The pool and playgrounds provide summertime fun while easy access to Metrorail, I-495 and I-395 makes commuting hassle-free! Our spacious apartments will suit your everyday needs.
Ease and convenience are two of the hallmarks at Landmark Ridge. Large apartment homes offer panoramic views and easy access to Van Dorn Metrorail stop. Our apartments are available fully furnished.

Avalon Potomac Yard offers brand new 1 and 2 bedroom Alexandria apartment homes, some with lofts and dens, for lease. Apartments include gourmet kitchens with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops. Community amenities feature a two level fitness center with flex studio and yoga/stretching room, swimming pool, and courtyards with grilling areas. Avalon Potomac Yard is conveniently in Potomac Yard, with shopping, dining and entertainment.

Meadow Woods is a neighborhood of charming apartment homes in an unspoiled natural setting just south of Old Town Alexandria. All of the features of one-story home design have been planned into these spacious residences. We have built our reputation on quality, value and service to assure your complete satisfaction! Meadow Woods offers you a professional, friendly staff, easy commute to Huntington Metro Station, Fairfax Country Elementary School across the street, well maintained lush landscaping and ample parking. For the active lifestyle, Meadow Woods features fun-filled playgrounds and basketball court, refreshing swimming and wading pools as well as a shady barbecue and picnic area. Best of all, your cat is welcome too! *Prices are subject to change. With its charisma and history, Old Town Alexandria is well known for having the best of everything - restaurants, stores, galleries, recreation and nightlife. By becoming a resident of The Colecroft Community, you can enjoy the best of everything ... right around the corner. Just steps to the Braddock Metro Station, 1 stop from the Ronald Reagan National Airport, 3 stops from Springfield/95 interchange and 4 short stops from the Pentagon, the townhouses and condominiums of The Colecroft Community afford you comfort, convenience and class. Treat yourself to a tour and you'll see. The Colecroft Community offers you a new standard in urban living - affordability and elegance all with convenience. 
Charming, exquisite homes are just the beginning. The Colecroft Community offers spacious 2 bedroom/2 bath condominiums, 3 bedroom/2 bath townhouses, and 3 bedroom/3 bath townhouses with den. Quality features include custom eat-in kitchens with warm oak cabinetry; state-of-the art General Electric appliances including microwave ovens, flat top stoves along with a washer and dryer in every unit; elegant hardwoods; wood burning fireplace; ceramic tile baths; custom carpeting; abundant closet space and state-of-the art security availability.
Luxury amenities continue throughout The Colecroft Community from the well-equipped exercise facility to the captivating party room and adjacent garden available for your private entertaining. Add the convenience of garage parking, only available with select units, and an array of retail shops conveniently located on the street level.
You can have it all - Comfort, Convenience, and Style.
Come join us for the convenience and prestige of luxury living at The Colecroft Community located in Old Town Alexandria, Virginia.

At The Fields of Alexandria, this is truer than ever before. Because here you will find a home full of comfort. A home that is designed to enrich your life while meeting your needs. Perhaps the first thing you notice is the way light flows freely from room to room, brightening every space. Then, there is the sense of relaxation, found in everything from the open designs to the great features, such as: Plush, wall-to-wall carpeting Generous closet space Gas heat and hot water Thoughtfully designed kitchen with a full complement of modern appliances Washers and dryers available Your home is your sanctuary and showroom. A place to rest quietly and a place to host friends. No matter your needs and no matter how they may change, you?ll find the home that is perfect for you at The Fields of Alexandria. The comforts of The Fields of Alexandria stretch far beyond your home. In fact, when you live here, you will find yourself surrounded by great amenities designed to help you enjoy more of every day. You will have: Refreshing pool Learning center On-site playground Cats and large dogs welcome

Cameron Station is a community of single family homes, townhomes and condominiums located in the West End of Alexandria, Virginia. The award-winning designs were built according to the architectural styles of the 18th and 19th centuries and as a re-creation of an old-fashioned American small town. Brick sidewalks, colonial street lamps, pocket parks, and other unique environmental elements add to the community?s charm and unique ambiance.
The Cameron Club is a focal part of the community and includes a great room with kitchen for social and business gatherings, meeting rooms, a fitness center and gym, outdoor adult and children?s pools, and administrative offices. Retailers along Brenman Park Drive include a coffee house, restaurant, market, dry cleaners, spa and salon, dentist, and daycare facility. Alexandria?s newest grade school, Samuel W. Tucker Elementary, is located at the west end of the community, and Cameron Station is bordered by two city parks at each end?Ben Brenman Park and Armistead L. Boothe Park?both of which contain athletic fields and playgrounds. Also bordering the community are several dog parks, picnic areas, and bike paths. Alexandria?s central library, Charles E. Beatley Jr. Library, is directly across the street. A free shuttle bus transports residents to the nearby Van Dorn Metro station during morning and evening rush hours.
Upon entering, it is obvious that his two-story, 3 bedroom, 2 1/2 bath condominium exudes luxurious living. Every feature from the architectural half columns to the premium sound proof flooring to exquisite color selections has been specifically picked to enhance the floor plan but to also to accentuate the design of the community. The designer kitchen is a gourmet chefs dream with all stainless steal appliances (refrigerator, gas range, built-in microwave & dishwasher). In addition, the kitchen offers an island and tons of countertop & cabinet space. A double sided gas fireplace separates the living room and formal dining room. The 3 bedrooms are located on the second floor of the condo and the master bedroom with ensuite is truly a retreat with the vanity with double sinks, separate stand up shower and jetted tub. 
Do not miss this opportunity to experience the Cameron Station lifestyle!

This classic mid-century Eastport cottage with water access to Back Creek has been stylishly remodeled to double the space, the sunlight, and the charm. Vintage pine floors glow amid period molding. The living room has been bumped out into a sun room large enough to warm a family's daily dinette; the old kitchen has had a hip rehab (think soapstone, not granite); the French doors of dining room (or maybe family room?) let out onto large yard framed by nativist landscaping. Original first floor bedroom is well sized, but needs an armoire; it has first floor full bath to itself.
Now up to the 2nd floor dormer addition: stairwell opens onto cozy sunlit nook; corridor leads to master loft, with his-'n-her closets; the master bedroom shares a full bath with kid bedroom (or office) through jack-'n-jill doors.
The Basement houses laundry and lots of storage space. Outdoors, expansive fenced-in yard includes stone patio for barbecue and lawn large enough for dog-runs, full-field T-ball, internecine volley ball, or competitive croquet.
Meander with the dog through Parkwood down to the community association's beach and piers on Back Creek. Or else head around the corner to the Eastport shopping mall -- to the Annapolis Gym for a work-out or rub-down; to Palate Pleasers for gourmet take-out & baked goods; to the Eastport Farmer's Market for garden-fresh fruits &amp; vegetables; to Eastport Kitchen for gourmet sadwiches; to Eastport Liquors for in-store specials on wines and liquors. Or hop over to Vin 909 across Bay Ridge for the popular wine-bar and small-plates, or saunter down Chesapeake Ave to Bakers & Co. for buttery bread and pastries; then continue down to 6th St. and over the Annapolis harbor scene to City Dock. Nice way to live.

Gorgeous condo in Ashburn! Lake View! This is a two-on-two condo, meaning the bottom two floors are one condo and the second two floors are another separate condo. There's also a bay window in the living room and a balcony off the back. A beautiful set of French doors separate the Kitchen, Kitchenette, and secondary living/office space from the front of the unit where you have the dining room and main living area. The master bedroom is very spacious and has two walk-in closets (also spacious), along with a master bath that has two separate sinks with under cabinet storage, a linen closet, luxury shower with two shower heads, and a separate water closet. The laundry room is also on the second floor making for no hassle going up and down stair with laundry baskets. Two additional medium sized bedrooms and a full dual vanity bathroom are to the back of the second floor. There is also a private one car garage, and additional parking space in the driveway.
Only one minute from the toll road entrance, you can be downtown in less than 40 minutes. Ashburn is a beautiful, well-planned, and safe community.

We hold many social events in our multi-purpose entertainment area, with adjoining kitchenette and open lounge area that features a gorgeous balcony. You can work up a sweat or enjoy a yoga class in the fitness center, or challenge a friend to a game in the billiards room. Your individually-controlled heating and air-conditioning and wall-to-wall carpeting will provide comfort for you throughout the year. For your convenience, each home has a washer and dryer and 24-hour maintenance service is provided.

The home: Newly remodeled, verrry cozy 3BR end-unit townhome with lots of character! Newly refinished reclaimed solid hardwood floors, wood burning brick fireplace, new carpet upstairs, a balcony, in-unit washer and dryer, lots of storage space and lots of lighting !
The Community: 2016s Money Magazine named Columbia the best small city to live in! Consistently named as one of the top cities to live in, Columbia is packed with trees, trails, rivers and lakes spanning several miles. Just steps from your front door, is the quiet and scenic Lake Elkhorn Trail! Following this trail (steps from the front door) in just a miles run or a quiet walk you will reach the scenic Lake Elkhorn Park shown in the photos below. Directly across the street, you have the East Columbia Public Library that has ample amount of well-lit study spaces, vast catalog of books and many more resources. Currently only partially opened, the library will reopen bigger and better this December with the finalization of its remodeling. There is a local Farmer's Market every Thursday in the parking lot of the library across the street! Giant Supermarket is also walking distance or 2-3 min driving. Columbia Mall, Whole Foods and the famous Merriweather Post Pavilion Amphitheater are less than 2mi away, situated near Lake Kittamaqundi. Lots of music, food, and shopping right by the water! Snowden Shopping Center less than 3 min drive. 20 min away from DC and Baltimore, both, off of RT29 and RT95.
Dasher Brown Community Center is a quarter of a mile away, where there is a fitness center, pool, and many more community resources!

Chatham Gardens is just minutes to the Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport, I-695 and I-70, shopping, dining and entertainment venues are just a short drive away.

Burgess Mill Station, where great living and shopping are only minutes apart. Located within walking distance of historic Ellicott City, Maryland main street, this quaint community features a large selection of antique and specialty shops, restaurants and cafés. Burgess Mill Station is a luxury community where old-world charm meets today?s modern lifestyle. Built on 18 acres, the 198 apartment home community features incredible amenities, both inside and out. Burgess Mill Station is right next door to Howard County?s new Roger Carter Community Center. This fantastic new facility features state-of-the-art amenities including an indoor swimming pool, splash zone, basketball court, fitness center and climbing wall.

Make your new home Charleston Place in Ellicott City, MD a city ranked sixth, along with nearby Columbia, MA, among MONEY Magazine's 2014 Best Places to Live in America. Offering one- and two-bedroom apartments for rent, Charleston Place provides access to Howard County Public Schools, some of the best in the country. You'll enjoy newly renovated kitchens with rich maple cabinetry and brushed silver appliances, ceramic-tile baths, air conditioning, and a balcony or patio. Select apartments have a separate dining room, and a den or office. Additional amenities include a swimming pool, tennis courts, fitness and business centers, car care area, and more! * Just 20 minutes from the Baltimore/Washington International Airport, Charleston Place is near I-695, I-95, I-70, U.S. Route 29, U.S. Route 40, and Route 100. Our pet-friendly complex is located near H-Mart Supermarket and Baltimore. Enjoy off-street parking. Housing vouchers welcome.

Orchard Meadows at North Ridge Apartments is located in historic Ellicott City, MD. Ellicott City is known for its convenient location, historic downtown and outdoor recreation opportunities. The accessible location allows residents easy access to Baltimore and Washington DC from major thoroughfares such as US-Route 29, Interstate-95 and Route 100. The historic downtown Ellicott City is just a few miles from Orchard Meadows offering eateries, boutique shops and historical location that contribute to its charm. For outdoor enthusiasts Ellicott City offers three major parks within 5 miles of the community. Orchard Meadows at North Ridge offers spacious one and two bedroom apartments for rent. In addition, residents enjoy an attractive collection of community amenities to include a strength and cardio center with yoga studio, cyber caf, swimming pool with sundeck seating, and an outdoor kitchen and fire pit. As a Milestone Management Community, our residents enjoy online resident services and bill pay and 24-hour emergency maintenance service. All of which allow for a more relaxed and carefree living to those that call us home.

A thriving, luxury community in beautiful Ellicott City, Kaiser Park's apartments, features two bedroom apartment homes and three bedroom townhomes. Our homes offer spacious floor plans, custom two-tone paint, and uniquely-styled GE appliances in all kitchens. For your on-the-go lifestyle, Kaiser Park is equipped with a newly renovated cardio center and high-speed internet access. Just minutes away from downtown Historical Ellicott City, you have easy access to eateries, boutique and historical locations.

Alta at Regency Crest is located at 3305 Oak West Drive Ellicott City, MD and is managed by Wood Partners, a reputable property management company with verified listings on RENTCafe. Imagine living in the Turf Valley resort community in picturesque Ellicott City, Maryland. We now offer short-term/corporate apartments! * Apartments in Fairfax, VA 22030 * History of Fairfax, VA * The stately antebellum homes and historic buildings from the early 1800s tell the story of a city that grew from Civil War strife to a thriving urban center. Structures that reflect the past include the Fairfax County Courthouse, Ratcliffe-Allison House, Ford House and Truro Rectory. These are celebrated landmarks reminiscent of the Confederacy, tobacco plantations and the strong foothold of the church parish. During the 1900s, the trolley connected Fairfax to Washington, DC and today Fairfax is recognized as a suburb of the District of Columbia. * Apartments in Fairfax, VA 22030 are surrounded by the city's cultural heritage. The Fairfax Museum and Visitor Center is housed in one of the city's oldest buildings and once served as an elementary school. The Huddleson Library and Fairfax Art League functions out of the Old Town Hall built in 1900. The National Register of Historic Places can identify other notable venues. * The 22030 Economy * The Fairfax population earns a high median household income, reflective of a strong job market and top-notch schools. In this zip code, a higher percentage of residents have earned a bachelor's degree or higher as compared to the Virginia average. Major employers in the area include SunTrust, Federal Technology Services, Verizon Wireless, Fairfax Nursing Center and Fairfax Honda. * On the outskirts of the city are the Northern Virginia Community College and George Mason University. On the university campus stands the Center for the Arts complex, Aquatic and Fitness Center and Recreation Sports Complex. * Recreation and Dining in Fairfax * Walking trails and parks abound near apartments for rent in Fairfax, VA 22030. There are also many opportunities to appreciate the cultural arts, including music, theater, and dance. Annual events include the Chocolate Lover's Festival, Fairfax Spotlight on the Arts, National Trails Day, Irish Festival, Fall for the Book Festiva

Newly renovated, clean, and well kept 3 Bedroom 2 Bath condo located in the highly desirable Lakeford neighborhood in Merrifield, VA. This open, well-lit unit is perfect for both the young family or the working professional. The Master bedroom is very large- big enough for both a king size bed and all necessary furniture. It is equipped with both a walk-in closet as well as a double-sided sliding door closet, full bathroom with bath and shower, as well as washer and dryer units connected to the Master bath. Second bedroom is large as well and perfect for either a roommate or a growing child. Can comfortably fit a queen bed (possibly king). Third bedroom is a bit smaller but comfortably fits a double bed and possibly a queen. Was previously used as an office but has it's own window and closet.
Newly renovated kitchen comes with new electric stove/range, new range hood, and new refrigerator. Sink is equipped with well-functioning garbage disposal. Dining area is perfect for 4 but can seat 6 comfortably as well. Kitchen, dining area, and foyer has new cherry-maple flooring. 
Unit is located in a quiet neighborhood but is also walking distance to tons of restaurants, shopping and activities including the Mosaic District*, Jefferson Park, Dunn-Loring Metro station, downtown Merrifield, downtown Falls Church, multiple metro-bus stops and multiple grocery stores**. It is a short commute to Downtown DC or Tyson's Corner, with multiple routes to get on/off both 495 and 66. Neighborhood is backed up to Pine Spring Elementary school- allowing for extremely easy school drop-off.

About Us * Sky Properties manages 6-unit garden-style apartment buildings 10 minutes outside of Washington, DC and just minutes from the Beltway in the sought-after Montgomery County suburb of Takoma Park/Silver Spring. Many of the buildings are located near Wayne and Flower Avenues, while others overlook Sligo Creek Park. Most apartment buildings are within walking distance to the Silver Spring Metro Station. * Convenient Location * There is no need for a car when you live at Sky Properties. The J-4 Metro bus stops close to our buildings and provides direct access to Bethesda and College Park, while the Silver Spring and Takoma Park Metro Red Line stations are only 10-15 minutes away on Montgomery County's Ride-On bus service. Washington, DC's Union Station is just under 30 minutes away. * The University of Maryland campus in College Park is only 10 minutes away on their shuttle, which stops nearby. We are also close to Columbia Union College, Walter Reed Army Medical Center, the Food and Drug Administration (FDA), the National Security Agency (NSA), NASA's Goddard Space Flight Center, the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Discovery Communications, and the American Film Institute (AFI). Minutes away are two of the area's premier music and performance venues, Strathmore Hall in Rockville, MD and Clarisse Smith Center, on the Campus of the University of Maryland. * Great Neighborhood * The Long Branch neighborhood is friendly, active, and bursting with amenities. Sky Properties residents can walk to restaurants, shops, banks, a dry cleaner, a movie theatre, 2 supermarkets, and more in a nearby shopping center, while the Silver Spring/Takoma Park Food Coop, Whole Foods, and Trader Joe's are a short drive away. * Sligo Creek Park is a short walk away, where you can enjoy playgrounds, picnic areas, tennis courts, a golf course, and a 10.2 mile long paved trail for hiking and biking. The nearby Long Branch Community Center offers a pool, fitness center, and year round activities, and the Pyramid Atlantic Art Center offers numerous educational programs. You can walk to Rolling Terrace Elementary School and the neighborhood branch of the Montgomery County Public Library. Class Act Arts holds events and workshops that are open to the public and a Saturday Morning Children's Series at the Robert E. Parilla Performing Arts Center at Montgomery College. * Beautiful Apartments * Sky Properties offers light and airy studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom a

At The Reserve at Town Center, you'll find exceptional Loudoun County homes just moments from all the shopping, dining and entertainment of Dulles Town Center. Potomac Square is a luxury apartment community located in the master-planned Cascades community in Sterling, Virginia. Lerner Parc Dulles is more than an apartment, its a home! Here you will find a home that fits your personality. Whether you select one of the Courtyard-Style homes where all apartments include a garage, plus a patio or balcony overlooking a lovely fountain; or the Garden-Style apartment with classic three-story walk-up design, or the Carriage House-Style bi-level homes with attached garages, you will agree this is not your typical apartment community. No matter what the style, all apartments include grand features like luxury kitchens with granite countertops and maple cabinets, washers and dryers and lofts in select apartment homes. On any given day your biggest decision will be whether to splash around in the expansive resort-style pool or book an appointment with the masseuse in our massage studio. And, if you feel the need for some retail therapy, walk on over to Dulles Town Center. Who doesnt want a premier shopping mall with 185 specialty shops and restaurants just steps from their front door? With abundant amenities and an apartment that feels more like a private home in an unparalleled location, youll be anxious to make Parc Dulles your new home sweet home.

We offer spacious apartments for rent, including one-, two-, and three-bedroom floor plans, with granite countertops, high ceilings, fireplaces, plentiful storage, and covered breezeways. * When you choose Village at Potomac Falls, you're making a choice for convenience. There's nothing in DC like Hecht Warehouse's loft style apartments. Polished concrete floors meet subway-tiled bathrooms. Brookland Press takes its inspiration from the industrial era printing press, and pays homage to the artisans and craftsmen of Brooklands early days. With two distinct buildings, The Foundry and The Forge, youll have your choice of tastefully designed studio, one, and two bedroom residences with an unparalleled list of amenities for workdays and weekends alike. * THE FOUNDRY * With a new 2-story addition, the original 3 & 4-story industrial warehouse was converted to a 157-unit residential building now called The Foundry. Inspired in part by the existing historic elements from the previous structure, The Foundrys lofted ceilings, concrete columns and floors, and dramatic floor to ceiling windows create a vintage living experience rooted in texture and space unlike any found in the neighborhood. * THE FORGE * In juxtaposition to its sister building, The Forge is a brand new 6-story structure with 139 residences, featuring a wholly modern feel. With engineered wood floors and industrial fixtures and finishes, The Forge brings a modern sensibility to Brookland Press. Listing Rental Date Availability has changed to mid-November (move-in date negotiable). The historic Car Barn was developed in 1896 as a maintenance facility and administrative offices for the Metropolitan Railroad Company. This Romanesque Revival style building was redeveloped in 2004 into 196 condos. The massive L-shaped design of the Car Barn lends itself well to a wonderful interior courtyard. Residents enjoy the community pool, covered parking and the security of 30 foot gates. The Car Barn location on Capitol Hill in the Lincoln Park neighborhood is a short ten minute walk to the Stadium Armory/Eastern Market Metro Stations and all the venues on Barracks Row. Parking spots (up to 2) may be available for monthly use. Otherwise, street parking is plentiful. One visitor parking pass per/unit. Spacious bedroom with two walk-in closets and new modern gray flooring installed wall to wall. Electricity bill from Pepco not included in rent. Working fireplace for the cozy Winter ahead. Some furniture may be left to furnish unit, if tenant interested in that option. Mid-November start date, negotiable.

A little about the building and the area:
Every unit at Solo Piazza has its own outdoor space as well as sharing the buildings dramatic roof deck overlooking the city. Kitchens and baths feature Poggenpohl cabinetry topped with Italian granite counters. Many units feature gas fireplaces as well for cool DC evenings. The building also features a two-story lobby with concierge, secure garage parking, and extra storage. The location could not be more central within 1-2 blocks of Whole Foods, CVS, Starbucks, the Studio Theater, multiple Metro stations, VIDA Fitness, Bang Salon and the multitude of restaurants, shops, and cafes of Logan Circle. 
Vibrant Logan Circle At Your Doorstep
Logan Circle is one of DC s most vibrant, happening and desirable neighborhoods with Victorian row houses, repurposed loft spaces and new condominiums lining the streets. Residents enjoy a host of retailers, restaurants, coffee houses, art galleries, furniture stores, live theater and nightlife venues. Property values for the exceptional condominium residents found in Logan Circle top some of the highest price per square foot figures in the city and for good reason. Logan is definitely one the hot spots to be. 
Perfectly situated just one block from the buzz of 14th Street in Logan Circle, residents enjoy literally having the best of the city at their doorstep. Within 1-2 blocks are Whole Foods, Vida Fitness, CVS, Logan Hardware, the Studio Theatre and the neighborhood's abundant restaurants and boutiques. Solo Piazza is a short walk to the Metro's Green Line at the Mt. Vernon-Convention Center station and also the Red Line's Dupont Circle station.

A true FURNISHED one bedroom apartment in The President Condominiums at 2141 Eye Street NW. 
This furnished corner unit has a galley kitchen with electric stove, garbage disposal, refrigerator, and dishwasher! There's air conditioning, a bathroom with the best water pressure in DC, and windows wrapping the walls the apartment - there's a window in every room! 
The living/dining room is large, and the bedroom easily fits a queen bed and dressers. Plenty of storage space in the walk-through closet. 
BUILDING: 
The President has a front desk staffed 24/7 that will sign for packages and watches the front door. There are 6 washers/dryers in the basement, and I've never had to wait to use them. The building is wired for Comcast and RCN. (You can look up reviews of The President, they're pretty accurate. In short, it's a pretty solid building in a great location - this place is a good value.) The building is mostly studio/efficiency units, but this is one of the biggest apartments in the building, a coveted corner 1-bedroom. 
LOCATION: 
The apartment is in a fantastic location, across the street from the Foggy Bottom Whole Foods Market. It's situated at the north end of George Washington University's campus, you're only steps away from the IMF, World Bank, State Department, and White House. Transportation is a breeze - The apartment is one block away from the Foggy Bottom metro station (blue and orange lines) & bus stops (including the Circulator), and there are two sets of Capital Bikeshare docks within half a block. You're only a 5-15 minute walk from Dupont, Georgetown, West End, and downtown DC. 
PARKING: 
If you have a car, the apartment does not include a spot, but it's Zone 2 parking, and you should be able to find a spot within 2 blocks of the apartment, especially after Whole Foods closes at 10pm. 
LEASE TERMS/FEES: 
The rent is $1,850/month, and includes water and trash. The tenant is responsible for electric and phone/cable/internet. Electric depends on use, but we have averaged $40-80 a month. 
There's an application fee of $50.00 per applicant, and you'll need to provide first month's rent + security deposit equal to one month's rent upon application approval and leasing signing.

Named after the American Civil War Colonel, Robert Gould Shaw, who commanded the first African American regiment in the US Army in 1863 and is the namesake of the Shaw neighborhood, The Colonel is meant to honor the significance of the units contributions to our nation. Monroe Street Market and Cathedral Commons Win Big at This Year?s NAHB Best in American Living Awards This year, two Bozzuto communities, Monroe Street Market and Cathedral Commons, won a grand total of three awards at the NAHB Best in American Living Awards (BALA), the nation?s premier award program that recognizes design excellence for the entire residential building industry including single family and multifamily homes communities. The first recognition goes to Monroe Street Market, which was selected as the coveted Multifamily Community of the Year. In the heart of downtown Washington, DC, The Apartments at CityCenter anchors a vibrant neighborhood, interconnected with nearby entertainment, shopping and cultural offerings including the Penn Quarter, Verizon Center and nearby theater venues.
